thread.title: J-K encounter: Two Hizbul millitants killed in Kulgam district, search ops going on
thread.title_full: J-K encounter: Two Hizbul millitants killed in Kulgam district, search ops going on

title: J-K encounter: Two Hizbul millitants killed in Kulgam district, search ops going on
text:
A + A - Picture for representation 
Security forces today killed two Hizbul Mujahideen millitants in an encounter in the Nowpora Yaripora area of south Kashmir's Kulgam district. 
Personnel from the Jammu and Kashmir police's Special Operation group and the Indian Army cordoned off the village of Nowpora Sunday early morning after receiving specific inputs about presence of the militants in the village. 
As the forces neared the house where the militants were hiding, they came under gunfire, leading to a gunfight in which two two militants were killed. 
The killed militants were identified as Mudasir Tantary and Mohd. Hashim. Both are believed to be associated with the Hizbul Mujahideen. Two rifles along with other arms and ammunition has been recovered from the killed militants. 
Security forces are continuing with searches in the area. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
